item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-18
item.description: Coinbase files to go public confidentially and we’re hyped (2 minute read) Coinbase has filed to go public, likely debuting in early 2021.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-16
item.description: Facebook is having an end-of-year, company-wide meeting right now (Twitter Thread) This Twitter thread follows Facebook’s company-wide end-of-year meeting.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-23
item.description: Charli D’Amelio hits 100 million TikTok followers (3 minute read) Charli D’Amelio has reached 100 million followers on TikTok.
